story: A long time ago Bran Stark, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a prophet. The evil Daenerys Targaryen one day posed a threat to the jewel of Bran Stark. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Willas Tyrell to seek help. Willas Tyrell was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Castle Black at the Winter Solstice, Bran Stark met Robb Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Winter Solstice, Bran Stark and Robb Stark were almost in Crossroads Inn when they realized Daenerys Targaryen was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Bran Stark used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually The House was safe again. Bran Stark and Robb Stark went to Great Sept of Baelor and celebrated by getting married.

story: A long time ago Jon Snow, King from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a ruler. Everything was quiet when one day Robert Baratheon threatened The House of Jon Snow. Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Benjen Stark got stronger and learnt invisibility. During a long training session in The Dreadfort at Christmas, Jon Snow met Viserys Targaryen. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Viserys Targaryen finally found Robert Baratheon in Great Sept of Baelor. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Robert Baratheon. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the beloved the treasure. In Seagard celebrated with Viserys Targaryen by listening to a storytelling .

story: Margaery Tyrell was Queen consort for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an influencer. The evil Arya Stark one day posed a threat to the treasure of Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Jaime Lannister to seek help. Jaime Lannister was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Winterfell at the Winter Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Joffrey Baratheon. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Christmas, Margaery Tyrell and Joffrey Baratheon were almost in The Whispering Wood when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Margaery Tyrell used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the treasure was safe again. Margaery Tyrell and Joffrey Baratheon went to Riverlands and celebrated by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Daenerys Targaryen, Princess from the House Targaryen, was known to be very good as a a revolutionary. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the jewel of Daenerys Targaryen. Initially Daenerys Targaryen was afraid, but with the help of Lyanna Stark got stronger and learnt military strategy. During a long training session in Castle Black at the Autumnal Equinox, Daenerys Targaryen met Aegon Targaryen. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Kings Landing at sunrise , Daenerys Targaryen faced Bran Stark . With the help of Aegon Targaryen and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy , the alliance scared away  Bran Stark . This is how Daenerys Targaryen managed to save the beloved the freedom. In The Ruby Ford celebrated with Aegon Targaryen by playing a game .

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the treasure of Margaery Tyrell. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Robert Baratheon, Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of teleportation. During a long training session in Saltpans at the first day of Spring, Margaery Tyrell met Tommen Baratheon. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Night, Margaery Tyrell and Tommen Baratheon were almost in Saltpans when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Margaery Tyrell used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the jewel was not under treat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Tommen Baratheon celebrated in Winterfell by getting married.

story: A long time ago Bran Stark, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a prophet. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened  the peace of Bran Stark . Initially Bran Stark was afraid, but with the help of Robert Baratheon got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. In Castle Black at the first day of Spring ,Bran Stark met Rickon Stark and they formed an alliance. Finally in Seagard at the Winter Solstice , Bran Stark faced Petyr Baelish . With the help of Rickon Stark and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Petyr Baelish . This is how Bran Stark managed to save the beloved the peace. In Deepwood Motte celebrated with Rickon Stark by making fireworks .

story: A long time ago Jon Snow, King from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a ruler. Everything was quiet when one day Tyrion Lannister threatened The House of Jon Snow. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Aerys II Targaryen, Jon Snow learnt the power of teleportation. In The Twins at the Autumnal Equinox ,Jon Snow met Khal Drogo and they formed an alliance. Finally in Oldstones at the Winter Solstice , Jon Snow faced Tyrion Lannister . With the help of Khal Drogo and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation , the alliance scared away  Tyrion Lannister . This is how Jon Snow managed to save the beloved The House. In Red Keep celebrated with Khal Drogo by playing a game .

story: Once upon a time, there was an advisor whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Queen regnant from the House Lannister. The evil Bran Stark one day posed a threat to the jewel of Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister did not know what to do and went to Tywin Lannister to seek help. Tywin Lannister was a master of slowing Time and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Karhold at the first day of Spring, Cersei Lannister met Joanna Lannister and they immediately became friends. At the Summer Solstice, Cersei Lannister and Joanna Lannister were almost in White Harbor when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Cersei Lannister used slowing Time forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the freedom was safe again. Cersei Lannister and Joanna Lannister went to Great Sept of Baelor and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: Margaery Tyrell was Queen consort for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an influencer. The evil Robert Baratheon one day posed a threat to the castle of Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Tywin Lannister to seek help. Tywin Lannister was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Seagard at the Winter Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Willas Tyrell and they immediately became friends. Finally in White Harbor at the Winter Solstice , Margaery Tyrell faced Robert Baratheon . With the help of Willas Tyrell and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation , the alliance scared away  Robert Baratheon . After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell celebrated in Seagard by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened the castle of Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Lysa Arryn to seek help. Lysa Arryn was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Winterfell at the Winter Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Joanna Lannister and they immediately became friends. At the first day of Spring, Tyrion Lannister and Joanna Lannister were almost in Red Keep when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the peace was safe again. Tyrion Lannister and Joanna Lannister went to The Eyrie and celebrated by  having a feast.

story: Robert Baratheon was Lord for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a military leader. Robert Baratheon was having an happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened  the freedom of Robert Baratheon . Robert Baratheon did not know what to do and went to Rhaegar Targaryen to seek help. Rhaegar Targaryen was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. In Torrhen's Square at the Autumnal Equinox ,Robert Baratheon met Renly Baratheon and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Robert Baratheon with the help of Renly Baratheon finally found Petyr Baelish in Saltpans. A bloody battle begun but Robert Baratheon thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Petyr Baelish. After the victory, the treasure was not under treat anymore. Robert Baratheon and Renly Baratheon celebrated in Seagard by making fireworks.

story: Robert Baratheon was King of the Andals the Rhoynar and the First Men for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a hunter. Robert Baratheon was having an happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened  the treasure of Robert Baratheon . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Rickon Stark, Robert Baratheon learnt the power of fire sorcery. In The Vale of Arryn at Night ,Robert Baratheon met Stannis Baratheon and they formed an alliance. Finally in The Twins at the first day of Spring , Robert Baratheon faced Bran Stark . With the help of Stannis Baratheon and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Bran Stark . After the victory, the jewel was not under treat anymore. Robert Baratheon and Stannis Baratheon celebrated in The Twins by watching a play.

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an advisor. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Arya Stark threatened  the treasure of Petyr Baelish . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Garlan Tyrell, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of mind controlling. During a long training session in White Harbor at Christmas, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Riverlands at Night , Petyr Baelish faced Arya Stark . With the help of Lysa Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling , the alliance scared away  Arya Stark . Eventually the freedom was safe again. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn went to The Whispering Wood and celebrated by getting married.

story: Margaery Tyrell was Queen consort for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an influencer. Margaery Tyrell was having an happy and peaceful life when Tyrion Lannister threatened  the treasure of Margaery Tyrell . Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid, but with the help of Euron Greyjoy got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. On the way to Bear Island at the Summer Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Loras Tyrell and they immediately became friends. At the Winter Solstice, Margaery Tyrell and Loras Tyrell were almost in Moat Cailin when they realized Tyrion Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Margaery Tyrell used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the treasure was not under treat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Loras Tyrell celebrated in The Eyrie by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was having an happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened  the freedom of Daenerys Targaryen . Initially Daenerys Targaryen was afraid, but with the help of Mace Tyrell got stronger and learnt invisibility. On the way to The Twins at the Winter Solstice, Daenerys Targaryen met Hizdahr zo Loraq and they immediately became friends. At sunrise, Daenerys Targaryen and Hizdahr zo Loraq were almost in Riverlands when they realized Cersei Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Daenerys Targaryen used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually The House was safe again. Daenerys Targaryen and Hizdahr zo Loraq went to The Ruby Ford and celebrated by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. The evil Margaery Tyrell one day posed a threat to the freedom of Tyrion Lannister. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Gendry, Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of mind controlling. On the way to The Eyrie at sunrise, Tyrion Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Tyrion Lannister with the help of Myrcella Baratheon finally found Margaery Tyrell in The Twins. A bloody battle begun but Tyrion Lannister thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Margaery Tyrell. After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Myrcella Baratheon celebrated in Red Keep by playing a game.

story: A long time ago Arya Stark, Lady from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a vigilante. Everything was quiet when one day Margaery Tyrell threatened the castle of Arya Stark. Initially Arya Stark was afraid, but with the help of Lyarra Stark got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. During a long training session in The Twins at Night, Arya Stark met Eddard Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Seagard at the first day of Spring , Arya Stark faced Margaery Tyrell . With the help of Eddard Stark and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Margaery Tyrell . After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Arya Stark and Eddard Stark celebrated in Seagard by  having a feast.

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as a procurer. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Daenerys Targaryen threatened  the castle of Petyr Baelish . Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid, but with the help of Khal Drogo got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. On the way to The Twins at Night, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn and they immediately became friends. Finally in Riverlands at Night , Petyr Baelish faced Daenerys Targaryen . With the help of Robert Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Daenerys Targaryen . This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the beloved The House. In Karhold celebrated with Robert Arryn by watching a play .

With the help of Robert Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy , the alliance scared away  Tyrion Lannister . After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn celebrated in Riverlands by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Tyrion Lannister threatened the peace of Bran Stark. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Jon Snow, Bran Stark learnt the power of invisibility. In The Whispering Wood at sunrise ,Bran Stark met Sansa Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Sansa Stark finally found Tyrion Lannister in Karhold. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the beloved the peace. In Karhold celebrated with Sansa Stark by watching a play .
